title: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world

Hurricane Melissa barrels towards Cuba as Jamaica warned of more 'catastrophic' flooding
The category three hurricane is the strongest storm to ever hit Jamaica in modern history.
Strong winds and flying debris as Hurricane Melissa makes landfall
Storm surges of 13 feet (3.9m) above ground level and destructive waves are expected as the storm hits Jamaica.
